description: I also had the same problem as Chris.
I was having the same issues as others in the reviews, octoprint doesn't come witha native gui, so you have to go to your web browser and open http://0.0.0.0:5000/
summary: Open in your browser afer install

description: I launched it then it opens terminal, then closes terminal and nothing happens.
OctoPrint is a service that will run in the background. To access it, access http://127.0.0.1:5000/ on your browser.
summary: For those of you that are confused..

description: After installing MUST USE WEB BROWSER and go to http://127.0.0.1:5000 as posted by other users and in documentation. works as it should
summary: Works as intented, if people READ they would see how to use

description: Go to http://127.0.0.1:5000/ after starting it

Unexpected error while connecting to serial port: /dev/ttyUSB0 SerialException: '[Errno 13] could not open port /dev/ttyUSB0: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/dev/ttyUSB0'' @ comm.py:_openSerial:2691 (hook default)

Have had no issues running it after installation. Besides typing in the 127.0.0.1:5000 in the browser address you can also type in localhost:5000 and it will start up. I also have Octoprint running on a Raspberry Pi, this is a great program to use and there are many plug-ins available to customize your interface for additional productivity. 

If you install Octoprint on your Linux box be prepared to keep your printer attached all the time via the USB cable. If you would rather have the printer disconnected from the computer consider installing Octoprint on a Raspberry Pi.
summary: Great app and works as intended

description: Not much to add. This works as expected. Note: load OctoPrint by typing localhost:5000 in your browser.
Works prefectly. Note that this is not a regular app, but a daemon with a web interface that you need to access from http://127.0.0.1:5000

summary: please help me solve this issue

description:
Open FireFox
Browse to 
Http://127.0.0.1:5000	or on your LAN but not at host
Http://192.168.1.?:5000 	(Local IP follow your scheme obvs.)
Http://YourComputerName:5000	(Don't type 'YourComputerName' but your actual localhost name)

There is no program to run. Give it a try
I did try to install using terminal before and had an issue so I went this route and didnt have any issue or need to set up anything. 
This is what I used on attempt one:
https://www.illuminated3d.com/2020/06/05/setting-up-octoprint-on-ubuntu-20-04-with-python-3/
Happy Printing
summary: Like a Dream, Don't look for the program just browse to it

No esta actualizado, es la v1.4 cuando ya supero la 2

J'ai essayé avec Ubuntu et Essential, mais même s'il est possible de rejoindre le serveur octoprint, celui-ci refuse de se connecter à l'imprimante via USB. Cela fait 2 jours que je cherche une solution sur plein de forums, sans succès.
Dommage, car c'est la façon la plus simple d'installer octoprint.
summary: Impossible de se connecter à l'imprimante

description: On parvient à se connecter à l'imprimante en USB avec Octoprint sous Ubuntu en ajoutant --devmode à la commande snap install
